duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform phlebotomy and technical and clerical functions in the Laboratory based on the needs of the individual campus.
Handle blood, tissue, fecal matter, sputum, urine, spinal fluid and other body fluids.
Analyze specimens based on principles of human growth and development according to established lab guidelines.
Ensure routine laboratory procedures are performed with customer focus, teamwork, adaptability to change, problem solving, and personal excellence.
Work night shifts and handle contaminated specimens, including those with infectious diseases.

education_certification.credential: 6 months - 1 year experience in phlebotomy and/or specimen processing
